CMRO2 (Cerebral metabolic rate for oxygen)

CMRO2 (Cerebral metabolic rate for oxygen) Normally 38ml/kg (ten times the whole-body VO2). In general, CMRO2 increases with NMDA-antagonists, and decreases with GABA-agonists.

*Desflurane has no effect on CMRO2 .

**A bolus of alfentanil increases ICP.

[Moss, E. Continuing Education in Anaesthesia, Critical Care and Pain Medicine 1 , 67(2001).]
